TopicTitle: The 0.25 Waiting Room, now boarding passengers heading to Hypetown

Articles.Content:
You sir are asking for a spanking

Well that particular train left the roundhouse about an hour ago, did it not? The hype-train, however is the barn.
Jees. Stop posting reaction videos. The man/ woman has asked several times. Am I IBL here?

I have been F5'ing for at least 2 hours! Make it stop!

F5Ã¢â€žÂ¢ F% f5 F555555

...

razor naga toggle macro... saves lives

Worst episode of Doctor Who ever if you're a space nerd.

It was the only doctor who in the last few series where I just skipped through most of it.

I groaned out loud when the shuttle (shuttle!) CRASH LANDED on the moon. At that point I thought "Mother of god, this is bad"

Also, how can a creature just hatched lay an egg the size of itself?

good choice in artist havent heard blackmill in a while....

Blackmill is seriously something special. I forgot about him for a few months and was listening to all kinds of other music, and kept thinking to myself "Am I losing sound quality? are my headphones dying or something?" But it was just the music that didn't touch my "Soul" you can say. Heh.

I have been F5'ing for at least 2 hours! Make it stop!

F5Ã¢â€žÂ¢ F% f5 F555555

...

I have the sad duty to inform you that tonight your dreams will consist mostly of you sitting in front of a hyperdimensional monitor and hitting a large, ethereal F5 button.

MOAR HYPECOAL!

Yeah!

Hype Train, Brought to you by something
brought to you by high heart beats

Worst episode of Doctor Who ever if you're a space nerd.

What Doctor Who episode? They didn't air one last Saturday.
Really hoping the ads here work by impression count rather than clickthrough. They're making a fortune today!

Blackmill is seriously something special. I forgot about him for a few months and was listening to all kinds of other music, and kept thinking to myself "Am I losing sound quality? are my headphones dying or something?" But it was just the music that didn't touch my "Soul" you can say. Heh.

Hoooaaaa.... 'nuff said
alright im gonna go to the back of the hypetrain, for a new cup of coffee. leave the controls alone till i get back

What Doctor Who episode? They didn't air one last Saturday.

I know, they just had actors bleating and waving their arms about for half an hour. Some people might call it an episode but not me...
I see this thread is adding a new page every minute or so. That must mean that 0.25 is less than 6 months away! yay

Really hoping the ads here work by impression count rather than clickthrough. They're making a fortune today!

That fortune may be well offset by the bandwidth costs of a new update. Then again, I don't know if they have to pay extra for that of course

What Doctor Who episode? They didn't air one last Saturday.

I'm guessing they're spoilers and are from 'across the pond' as it were. In the US I hafta wait for a season or so till I know what's happening real time Dr. Who.

Is it me or is the train slowing down?

EEKK!!

It's NEARLY HERE!
They see me rollin' they hype me, i try to keep me calm and space on!
